026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.taglets;
027
028import java.util.EnumSet;
029import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
030
031import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
032
033import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
034import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet.Location;
035
036/**
037 * An inline taglet representing {@code {@docRoot}}.  This taglet is
038 * used to get the relative path to the document's root output
039 * directory.
040 */
041public class DocRootTaglet extends BaseTaglet {
042
043    /**
044     * Construct a new DocRootTaglet.
045     */
046    public DocRootTaglet() {
047        super(DocTree.Kind.DOC_ROOT, true, EnumSet.allOf(Location.class));
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    public Content getInlineTagOutput(Element holder, DocTree tag,
052            TagletWriter writer) {
053        return writer.getDocRootOutput();
054    }
055}
